component.description: AutoComplete provides live suggestions while an input is being typed.
component.attributes:
&input_component_attributes; &html_input_text_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
completeMethod false javax.el.MethodExpression java.util.List completeMethod(java.lang.String) Method providing suggestions.
var false java.lang.String Name of the iterator used in pojo based suggestion.
itemLabel false java.lang.String Label of the item.
itemValue false java.lang.Object Value of the item.
itemStyleClass false java.lang.String A string to be rendered onto the class tag of the selected items (tokens rendered inside the input container).
maxResults false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE Maximum number of results to be displayed. Default is unlimited.
minQueryLength false java.lang.Integer 1 Number of characters to be typed before starting to query. Default is 1.
queryDelay false java.lang.Integer 300 Delay to wait in milliseconds before sending each query to the server. Default is 300.
forceSelection false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, autoComplete only accepts input from the selection list. Default is false.
scrollHeight false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE Defines the height of the viewport for autocomplete suggestions.
effect false java.lang.String
effectDuration false java.lang.Integer 400
dropdown false java.lang.Boolean false
panelStyle false java.lang.String
panelStyleClass false java.lang.String
multiple false java.lang.Boolean false
itemtipMyPosition false java.lang.String Position of itemtip with respect to item. Default is "left top".
itemtipAtPosition false java.lang.String Position of item with respect to item. Default is "right bottom".
cache false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled autocomplete caches the searched result list.
cacheTimeout false java.lang.Integer 300000 Timeout value for cached results.
emptyMessage false java.lang.String Text to display when there is no data to display.
appendTo false java.lang.String Appends the overlay to the element defined by search expression. Defaults to document body.
resultsMessage false java.lang.String Hint text for screen readers to provide information about the search results. Default is "{0} results found, use arrow keys to navigate".
groupBy false java.lang.Object Value to group items in categories.
queryEvent false java.lang.String Event to initiate the query, valid values are "keyup" and "enter".
dropdownMode false java.lang.String Specifies the behavior dropdown button. Default "blank" mode sends an empty string and "current" mode sends the input value.
autoHighlight false java.lang.Boolean true Highlights the first suggested item automatically. Default is true.
selectLimit false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE Limits the selection. Default is unlimited.
inputStyle false java.lang.String Inline style of the input element.
inputStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the input element.
groupByTooltip false java.lang.String Tooltip to display on group headers.
my false java.lang.String Position of panel with respect to input Default is "left top".
at false java.lang.String Position of input with respect to panel Default is "left bottom".
active false true java.lang.Boolean Defines if autocomplete functionality is enabled. Default is true and a false value simply turns the component into a simple inputtext.
type false java.lang.String text Input field type. Default is text.
moreText false java.lang.String ... The text shown in panel when the suggested list is greater than maxResults.
unique false java.lang.Boolean false Ensures uniqueness of selected items.
dynamic false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if dynamic loading is enabled for the element's panel. If the value is "true", the overlay is not rendered on page load to improve performance. Default is false.
autoSelection false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if auto selection of items that are equal to the typed input is enabled. If true, an item that is equal to the typed input is selected. Default is true.
